Obama Music Video: Yes We Can

Feb 4, 2008

I try not to repost things for the sake of reposting, but I can’t resist here.

[youtube=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jjXyqcx-mYY]

On the topic, I appreciate Danah Boyd’s observations about the Obama being on the new media side of things, and Hillary still in with the old. It’s really no contest in my head, and I’m excited that there is so much energy around this primary.
